ygData.subject: All of my Decepticons(and some other chars)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Quatro/Bodicons:: Orchestra walked around, and saw Blacknightmare.  He walked up to her. I ve recovered from my wounds love.  Tell me, who was

::Orchestra/Composer/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/
Quatro/Bodicons::

 =
    Orchestra walked around, and saw Blacknightmare.  He walked up to her.
=

     "I've recovered from my wounds love.  Tell me, who was that?(Referrin=
g to KitKat)" Orchestra asked.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
=
     Composer went into the old Alliance base, and brought back an old, CR =
Chamber, and sat it on the ground.

     "Yup, we're almost done," he said =
in reply to Wheeljack.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Sku=
llgrin arrived back at the base after a while.  He saw the battle between M=
otormaster and Megatron.  This was obviously a battle to decide who would b=
e leader.  Skullgrin transformed to robot mode.

     "MEGATRON!!!  Leader,=
 it's you!!  Forget Motormaster, let's go Megatron!!!!  I've always been lo=
yal to you!!" Skullgrin cheered.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
       Triggerhappy arrived quickly in his jet mode.  He landed and trans=
formed to robot mode as well.  He didn;t say anything, his jaw dropped as f=
ar as a transformer can drop their jaw.  Megatron!  What a great but also s=
cary sight!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Cutthroat arr=
ived at the base.  He landed and transformed back to robot mode.

       "M=
egatron and Motormaster here!  Me want fight!!!!!!" Cutthroat sneered.

   =
     Cutthroat drew his weapon and fired a shot at Megatron then at Motorma=
ster.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Quatro kept going =
in hoverbike mode until he found the Maximal base.  He stopped and transfor=
med into robot mode.

       "Transformer Faction:Maximals
        Maximal =
Warship:Cybertronian Fire
        Status:Crashed, Housing Maximals," Quatro=
 said out some data he found on the Maximals and there base.

         Quat=
ro searched for more information on the Maximals, their enemies in particul=
ar.

         *General Maximal Enemies:Predacons,Decepticons* Quatro's resu=
lts stated.  

         *Some Specific Enemies:Hell Beast,Megatron,Drill Bi=
t, Killfest, Darkfate* 

         Quatro looked up info on Megatron.

     =
     *Megatron:Decepticon Commander*

          Quatro was puzzled for 2 mi=
lliseconds, but then looked back up on the deceased Megatron he had scanned=
 out.

          *Megatron:Predacon Commander*

          "Hmm," Quatro tho=
ught to himself,"I should be able to get just as good a reward for killing =
Megatron of the Decepticons as if I killed Megatron of the Predacons.  Ha! =
 For now, I should side with these Maximals.  I may be able to collect more=
 specific propaganda on my bounty."

           Quatro searched his endless=
 collection of data for the leader of these Maximals.

            *Faction=
 Leader:Iron Raptor*

            Quatro opened a special communications li=
nk with Iron Raptor.(He doesn't need no special wrist device or anything, h=
e has a special device planted inside of him, so he can talk like normal ex=
cept over long distances and when he is engaged in a long distance conversa=
tion his eyes glow blue instead of green)

           "Iron Raptor, leader =
of the Maximals, I am universal bounty hunter Quatro, and I came to Earth t=
o kill Hell Beast and Megatron.  I was thinking that I could side with you =
for a while, and we may be able to help eachother," Quatro said.
~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Decapitron, Legtrap, Headshot, Gut=
claw and Explobody arrived back at the base.  

       "It's Megatron!  Fig=
hting with Motormaster!  Don't get involved, just watch," Decapitron said t=
o his fellow Bodicons.
